name: Neon City
description:
Work in progress top-down open-world GTA-style retro game.

WASD = move the player

F = enter nearest car (or exit the one you're in)

I haven't added police yet, so I am trusting you not to kill any of the civilians...

Updates:

21/01/17: Collision detection for the player and buildings is sorted, you can no longer walk or drive through walls.

Plus...you can now enter a time trial race! Collect the green square to begin. My best time is 39.06. Don't expect to beat that.
